attributes.action: Ban MP’s voting on motions if they have a vested interest in the outcome.
attributes.additional_details: It seems archaic and potentially corrupt that an MP can change or influence any law which could materially benefit them.
attributes.background: Debate whether MP’s should have the ability to vote on a motion that might materially benefit them. For example if an MP’s spouse benefitted from non-dom status, or benefitted from offshore trusts that might be banned by parliament.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:
'Exclude MPs from parliamentary business where they have declarable interests'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643206
